QuestData.Title: Shadow's Fall
QuestData.Description:
Despite our efforts, the Void stands strong. All of the forces of Bastion fight, and fall one by one...
The Void cannot destroy us!
They are led by Tezulat the Annihilator, scourge of a thousand realms. This day, his reign of terror will end!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A fearsome commander in the Void's army. He has left many worlds shattered in his wake.
